## arrayCompact() function

Strips null and undefined items from arrays (non mutative).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function arrayCompact<TItem>(items: ArrayLike<TItem | null | undefined>): TItem[];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  items | ArrayLike&lt;TItem \| null \| undefined&gt; |  |
